predicate.note: Frames file for 'boycott' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 52.

example.name: passive
example.text: The vote in Ankara was boycotted *trace* by opposition politicians, who vowed to oust Ozal.
example.arg: opposition politicians, who vowed to oust Ozal

example.name: active
example.text: John boycotted Mary's bed for over six months out of spite. Mary didn't actually notice.
